projects.title: Scoreboard
projects.description: Web app built with ReactJS Scoreboard is an application that you can use to keep track of players and their points while you can save the data and use a stopwatch.

projects.title: Invitations
projects.description: Web app built with ReactJS. Invitations is an application that you can use to invite people and see who confirm that invite or not. The app save your invites.

projects.title: Star Wars API
projects.description: Web app built with ReactJS, Redux and Material-UI. This is an application that show you the information about characters, movies and other thing about the universe of Star Wars movies.

projects.title: Interactive Map
projects.description: Interactive Map made with Vanilla JS and Google Maps API. This web is like the light version of Google Maps where you can find directions and other things.

projects.title: Pixel Art
projects.description: Pixel art web app made with jQuery. You can draw images, and then you can download your image if you want. Have fun !

projects.title: Puzzle
projects.description: Puzzle app made with Vanilla JS. This is a simple puzzle where you can win if you solve it, show me your challenging ability. Use the arrow keys to move the pieces of the puzzle.
